Dionysos.MainDesc: The element Dionysos is the upmost element for producing Dionysos scripting files. It will also connect to the Dionysos device and transmit the script in a later stage of the project.
Dionysos.FileName: Fiel name of the final script file. After production of the script it will automatically be saved into this file.
Dionysos.Author: Author of the script. This will be added to the Dionysos report
Dionysos.ProjectName: Project name of the script. This will be added to the Dionysos report
Dionysos.Date: production date of the script. This will be added to the Dionysos report.
Dionysos.Purpose: Purpose comment then will be added to the Dionysos report.
Dionysos.Script: Final script file as it will be saved.
